title: Overall Process Flow
content: Our system helps users submit documents for analysis and routing. The main stages are: 1. Conversation via Lex – collect details or symptoms from the user. 2. File Upload – user uploads the required file or document. 3. Extraction – system extracts key data fields from the document. 4. Assignment – extracted data is routed to the right queue or specialist agent. Users can track progress via chat. File uploads are stored securely in S3.

title: File Upload Rules
content: You can upload PDF files (PNG) up to 6 MB. Each uploaded file triggers a background process that extracts and validates its contents. If a file fails to upload, try again or contact support with the file name and timestamp.

title: Extraction Rules
content: The extraction process identifies and structures key information such as: Document Type, Submission Date, Name or ID fields, Location or Department information, Coverage or Category details. If any of these fields are missing or unclear, the extractor will flag them for review.

title: Assignment Rules
content: Assignments are based on symptoms shared, document type and extracted information. - If the document type is 'Medical Report', route to Medical Analysis Agent. - If it contains 'Billing' or 'Payment' keywords, route to Finance Agent. - If it is a 'Support Request', route to Support Queue. If routing fails, assign to Default Review Queue.

title: Validation Guidelines
content: Validation ensures required fields are present before routing. - Missing identifiers (e.g., symptoms or location) trigger a user prompt. - required or mandatory fields are 'Symptoms', 'Patient current location' - Files without extractable text are flagged for manual review.

title: FAQs
content: Q: What happens after I upload a document? A: The system extracts key data and routes it automatically to the correct department or specialist. Q: How long does extraction take? A: Typically 10–20 seconds depending on document size. Q: What if extraction fails? A: The system will notify you and request re-upload or manual verification. Q: Can I upload multiple files? A: Yes, one file per message. Each triggers an independent extraction process.

title: Troubleshooting Extraction
content: If extraction fails repeatedly: 1. Check file type (PDF). 2. Ensure the file is not password protected or scanned in low quality. 3. Retry upload or use a different format. For assignment errors, contact the system administrator with the document ID.

title: Sentiment & Escalation
content: If the user expresses frustration or urgency (e.g., 'urgent', 'immediately', 'not working'), the system should prioritize the case or notify a human agent. Escalation thresholds: any message containing 'urgent' or explicit negative sentiment + missing required fields => escalate.

content.name: Dr. Amitabh Roy
content.profile_summary: Dr. Amitabh Roy is a senior psychiatrist at Harmony Mind Care Hospital, Delhi, specializing in mood and anxiety disorders. He has over 12 years of experience helping patients manage stress, depression, and emotional well-being.
